public class IndexIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<org.apache.lucene.document.Document>

Utility to iterate over the documents of an index.

Spence Koehler

Get the next document. Thread-safe.

Specified by:

remove

public void remove()
Delete the last document returned by next.

Note that in threaded use, this may delete an unexpected record due to other threads having potentially moved the pointers forward. In such cases as remove will be used, it is recommended to synchronize on the iterator instance if not used in a single thread.

Specified by:
remove in interface java.util.Iterator<org.apache.lucene.document.Document>

getETA

public java.util.Date getETA()
Estimate the time at which iteration will be complete based on the current rate.

Returns:
the estimated date iteration will finish, or the date actually finished if already done, or null if there is insufficient information to compute (i.e. iteration has not yet begun.)
